A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I had such high hopes\, and was so disappointed.  None of the questions raised in Episode 7; the 
Mary Sue Awakens were answered.  Who was Snoke? How did we get from episode 6 to episode 7?
This movie should be called "The Last Mary Sue" ( we should be so lucky ).  Every male character 
is either immoral or incompetent.  Every female character was both fundamentally moral and basically
right and competent.  If the SJWs who made this disaster want to spread their misandry effectively
then they need to at least make a good movie with a main character that doesn't effortlessly win
every confrontation.  Shallow characters\, the movie makes no sense.  SJW garbage.
